articles.author: Joel Khalili
articles.title: Fresh Bitcoin Hype Shows Crypto Just Can’t Help Itself
articles.description: After crashes, scandals, and SBF’s guilty verdict, many hoped the crypto industry would grow up. Speculation around the arrival of a spot bitcoin ETF shows old hype dies hard.
articles.content: The prospect that US residents may soon be able to invest in bitcoin through their brokerage, as if it were a regular stock, has prompted a fresh round of hype in crypto circlesand a surge in crypto … [+2137 chars]
